detail_desc: Thick socks knitted in a soft wool blend with a ribbed shaft.
Henley shirts in soft cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Short, hooded jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring at the top, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature, turtleneck and short sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Trousers in patterned satin with a high waist, concealed zip and a button at the back, and wide, softly draping legs.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets with a frill trim, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Short dress in mesh decorated with beads. Round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams under the bust and on the skirt for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Off-the-shoulder top in jersey containing glittery threads with a wide flounced trim at the top and long sleeves.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Straight-cut, airy top in beaded mesh made from a recycled polyester and Tencel™ lyocell blend with a round neck and short cap sleeves. Loose bead decorations made from recycled glass and plastic and sequin embroidery on the front. Long opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck, a slit in one side, and a wide band at the waist made from an airy weave that ties at one side. Unlined.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.

Bodysuit and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a print motif on the front, press-stud on the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers in ribbed jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline, short cap sleeves and a decorative knot detail at the hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave. Deep neckline with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Long top in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves, high slits in the sides and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped, ribbed top with long sleeves and lacing at the hem.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.

Jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons at the front, short, wide sleeves and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Fine-knit gloves with ribbed cuffs, one pair with a rubber print.

Short, A-line dress in woven fabric with a round, gathered neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with narrow trims, and a gathered flounce at the hem for added width. Unlined.
One-shoulder top in woven fabric with one short, wide sleeve and a straight-cut hem.
Running vest top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Narrow imitation leather belts in different designs with a metal buckle. Width 1.2 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Hat in a soft, glittery knit with an appliqué on the front, pompom on the top, earflaps, and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Oversized top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Two high slits at the front, one with a decorative print. Soft brushed inside.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a zipped leg pocket. Tapered legs with wide ribbing at the hems.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a frill at the hems. Unlined.
Fine-knit gloves.
Wide waist belt in imitation suede with a round metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Short-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband, and a flared skirt with a top layer in tulle.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and legs.

Nursing jumper knitted in a soft viscose blend containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck and long sleeves. Cable-knit front and sleeves, high slits with ties at the sides for easier nursing access, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless satin jumpsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a stand-up collar with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and an open section at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top. The jumpsuit is made partly from recycled polyester.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves and an inset lace trim at the waist. Lined.

Top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric in a boxy style with a ribbed stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Drawstring in a contrasting colour at the hem.
Slightly shorter, straight-cut flannel shirt with a collar and chest pocket. Buttons down the front and at the cuffs, yoke with a pleat at the back and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up and a silicone appliqué at the front.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Oversized jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets, raw edges and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Dropped shoulders, long raglan sleeves and a double-layered drawstring hood.
Fitted, V-neck top in soft viscose with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Gym bag in woven fabric that can be carried like a backpack. Print motif on the front and a drawstring at the top. Width 30 cm. Height 38 cm.

Short dress in burnout-patterned sweatshirt fabric with a raw-edge neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Visible seam down the back with a zip at the bottom and a rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Polo-neck top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves. Slim Fit.
Short, A-line skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and a wide, detachable belt with a covered buckle. Concealed zip at the back and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorter, straight-cut top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide neckline and long, wide raglan sleeves.

Popover jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Mesh-lined hood, a zip at the top with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms and an adjustable tab with a hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Mesh-lined kangaroo pocket with a zip at each side, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Mesh lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

PREMIUM QUALITY. Premium cotton shirt with a tab and button grandad collar and French front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide, elasticated flounce at the top that continues over the arms, a concealed zip in one side and a flare to the hem. Jersey lining.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a gentle V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps with lace.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Set with a bow tie and braces. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in satin with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a turtle neck, low dropped shoulders and wide sleeves.

Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch and fake fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Double-layered headband in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and straight, wide legs with creases.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a shimmering finish. Gently draped neckline at the front, and narrow elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back. Unlined.

Canvas sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Heels and a platform covered in braided fabric containing some jute. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm. Heel approx. 10 cm.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Chinos in soft, washed twill made from a cotton and linen blend. Extended waistband with a button, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Adjustable tabs with a button at the sides and slightly shorter legs. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats and buttons down the front. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
